ValidationRule.description: OTTR Mis Reason, Additional AOG details, OTTR Mis Details are required to close the AOG Case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: if( and(RecordTypeId= '01230000000Zemy', (or(text(Status) = 'Done',text(Status) = 'Completed')),(or( text(AOG_OTTR_Miss_Detail__c) = '', text(AOG_OTTR_Miss_Reason__c) ='', text(Additional_AOG_Details__c) ='')),text(Detail_Class__c) ='SPEX/Exchange', OTTR__c = false),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: OTTR Mis Reason, Additional AOG details, OTTR Mis Details are required to close the AOG Case.
